title: Boxen
name: boxen-sqs
description: Command line tool for Boxen: A Kit of Parts Squarespace developer SDK.

scripts.test:nodir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../boxen.js init
scripts.test:mkdir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; node ../boxen.js init my-project
scripts.test:isdir: rm -rf test ; mkdir test ; cd test ; mkdir my-project ; node ../boxen.js init my-project
